title: Variadic Functions in Go
description: In Go, a function that can take a variable number of arguments is called a variadic function. This challenge will test your understanding of how to use variadic functions in Go.

meta.title: Mastering Variadic Functions in Go | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: Explore the power of variadic functions in Go programming language. Learn how to implement the max function and leverage the flexibility of variable-length arguments.
meta.keywords: Go, Variadic Functions, Programming Tutorials, Max Function, Variable Arguments

verify.name: Verify Variadic Functions Output
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: Go 语言中的可变参数函数
i18n.description: 在 Go 语言中，一种可以接受可变数量参数的函数被称为可变参数函数。本次挑战将测试你对如何在 Go 语言中使用可变参数函数的理解。

meta.title: 掌握 Go 语言中的可变参数函数 | 编程教程
meta.description: 探索 Go 编程语言中可变参数函数的强大功能。学习如何实现 max 函数并利用可变长度参数的灵活性。
meta.keywords: Go, 可变参数函数, 编程教程, max 函数, 可变参数
